derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting any heel-like part or object): from Old French, literally heel', from Latin talus 'ankle bone, heel'

entry.def: The talons of a bird of prey are its hooked claws.

means.word_mean: 1. a sharp hooked claw especially on a bird of prey
